/api/portfolio/projects/:id.purposeOfFile: Fetches a single project by ID

/api/portfolio/about.responseSchemaExample: {"name":"John Doe","title":"Full Stack Developer","bio":"Passionate developer with 5 years of experience","email":"john@example.com","phone":"+1234567890","location":"San Francisco, CA","avatar":"https://example.com/avatar.jpg","resume":"https://example.com/resume.pdf","social":{"github":"https://github.com/johndoe","linkedin":"https://linkedin.com/in/johndoe","twitter":"https://twitter.com/johndoe"}}

/api/skills.purposeOfFile: Fetches all skills grouped by category

/api/experience.responseSchemaExample: [{"id":1,"company":"Tech Corp","position":"Senior Developer","startDate":"2020-01","endDate":"present","description":"Leading development of web applications","responsibilities":["Code review","Architecture design","Team mentoring"],"location":"Remote"}]

/api/education.responseSchemaExample: [{"id":1,"institution":"University of Technology","degree":"Bachelor of Science","field":"Computer Science","startDate":"2015-09","endDate":"2019-06","gpa":"3.8","achievements":["Dean's List","Best Project Award"]}]

/api/contact/messages.responseSchemaExample: [{"id":1,"name":"Jane Smith","email":"jane@example.com","subject":"Project Inquiry","message":"I would like to discuss a project","timestamp":"2024-01-15T10:30:00Z","read":false}]

/api/portfolio/testimonials.responseSchemaExample: [{"id":1,"name":"Sarah Johnson","position":"CEO at StartupX","company":"StartupX","testimonial":"Excellent developer with great attention to detail","rating":5,"avatar":"https://example.com/sarah.jpg","date":"2023-12-01"}]

/api/portfolio/services.responseSchemaExample: [{"id":1,"title":"Web Development","description":"Custom web applications using modern technologies","icon":"code","features":["Responsive Design","SEO Optimization","Performance Tuning"]},{"id":2,"title":"Mobile Development","description":"Native and hybrid mobile applications","icon":"mobile","features":["iOS Development","Android Development","React Native"]}]
